content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
1. walking down the street.
2. oddly bright red light in the sky. at first we thought it was a drone but it was too high and too bright for the height. 
3. a drone or high plane.
4. object started in the nw and moved quickly but in a fluid pattern towards the moon. we would have thought it was a satellite if it had moved in a constant arc pattern but instead it moved in more of a south east direction then fell towards the horizon line and slowly disappeared, in regards to brightness. made a "m" or "l" pattern.
5. worried and disconcerting. walked while filming videos/taking pictures. googled past ufo sightings in boise, id and there was one on dec.24, 2013 at 9;15, about the same time we saw the one tonight. 
6. it dimmed in the east.
content.summary: Bright red light. thought it was drone but too bright and had strange movement.

content.detailedDescription: Just came out to have a smoke and saw it hovering there. the same as the dec 24 2013 sighting.
content.summary: Red hoving light over boise, same as dec 24 2013 obj. it's back!

content.detailedDescription: Wife and i were driving around neighborhood looking at christmas lights as we do every year when we observed this very odd light moving across the sky , not a plane , not a helicopter, not a drone , not a meteorite,so....Anyway , took picture , tried to video but camera wouldn't focus .
content.summary: Observed red ball flying from east to west then changing heading and moving sout

content.detailedDescription: I was on the phone with my husband and smoking a cigarette when i seen a orange object come over the treeline i did not have my glasses on but it didn't make any sound as it went over. i told my husband that it was strange about 30 seconds later another orange object appeared going the same exact way, this time i got my glasses and i looked up at the orange object and little sparks of fire were coming out the end of it and then the went over  the building. the feeling i had after was i know i saw something that wasn't a plane or something i have seen before.
content.summary: Sitting out smoking and seen two orange lights fly over with in 1 minute of each other.

content.detailedDescription: I had just gotten home to my parents house in apple valley ohio at 10:17 p.M. and as i was walking towards the door i noticed a light ascending from the back of my neighbors woods which borders the lake. once the object reached about 75 feet above the ground it instantly began accelerating horizontally in a northern direction. as it moved over my neighbors house i realized it was a ufo so i pulled out my phone and took three pictures before the glowing orb blinked out. immediately after the event, i looked over to see my neighbor gazing up into the night sky while standing in her driveway. i went across the street and asked "did you just see that?" and she responded "ya! what was that?". we both agreed it wasn't a chinese lantern as it was moving against what little wind was present and she was amazed at its color, acceleration, proximity, and lack of noise or any aircraft navigation lights. this witness also happens to be a manager for delta airlines in columbus. of the three pictures, the last turned out best as i was a bit shakey on the first two, however, the last picture does have some motion blur from the objects movement. if you zoom in you can see the spherical shape of the orb.
content.summary: Watched an orb ascend from the woods across the street and fly over my neighbor's house before blinking out

content.detailedDescription: First sighted object nearly overhead out living room window. quickly ran outside, observed object travel due north at about 100 - 200 mph, then appear to move north-northeast and descend towards intermodal rail yard to north, near hoytville, ohio. as the object moved north, first the front light, then the red center light became obscured by the structure of the craft. it appeared to hover above the freight yard, this may have been a trick of perspective, however. at this point, only the 2 aftmost lights were still visible. i observed that the distance between the aft lights appeared to be about half the distance between the lights atop light poles at the freight yard. realizing that the craft was headed north towards bowling green,i ran inside to get my phone to text my friend to keep an eye out for it. upon returning outside with my phone,i could no long see the object. i have some sketches i made monday at work while trying to keep it fresh in my head. the most unsettling thing was the complete lack of sound. how do you keep an vehicle that size in the air without any noise? my daughter saw the object through the window,but did not accompany me outside.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangle,3 white/yellow lights in equilateral triangle, red pulsating light in center

content.detailedDescription:
At 7:03 pm (pst) december 25, 2014 at 506 south vermont avenue glendora, ca 91740; my mother and i witnessed a fireball yellow at its center and amber red around the outer edges (circular) but "flame-like" came from the north (angeles foothills - san gabriel mountains)at approx. at 35 yards distance from us at approx. 60ft. moving directly south towards us and paralell, as we were proceeding north on the west side of the street. there was "no" vehicle traffic, "no" air traffic, and "no" pedestrian traffic around us. completely quiet surroundings. the night sky was completely clear, no fog, no rain.

this fireball that itself was completely "noiseless" was proceeding fast at approx. 60-75 mph but then immediately stops next to us. no movement, we stop and watch this fireball as i examine it carefully. we were walking our two dogs and they became agitated. i called my girlfriend but was unable to make a connection; however, i then called my friend "ed" and was able to make a connection that faded in and out but strong enough to talk to him clearly. as we observed this fireball hoovering with absolutely no sound next to us i kept looking down at my watch to ensure there was no missing time. i continue to describe the event to my friend on the phone. 

i then told my mother to not look at the object, and continue to walk our dogs away from this fireball as she was now very nervous. i continued to talk with ed on the phone. 

the fireball then starts moving again slowly approx. 30 mph making a looping turn to the southwest direction. after proceeding approx. 1/4 mile it vanishes into thin air. no sound at all.

approx. 2 min. later it returns (or a second fireball came by); the same trajectory, but this time 1/2 the height in the air. approx. 30 feet up. the fireball slowed to a crawl as it passed by us, and, just as it passed us, poof-gone. afterwards i was able to make a connection on my cell phone with my girlfriend and told her all about our sighting and event.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flame travelling south approx. 35 yards away at 60 ft.; noiseless; stops and hovers for 4 mins; coninues on banks to southwest travels 1/4 mile then poof- vanishes; returns 2nd time; slows to a crawl, passes us going south then poof-vanishes; no noise.

content.detailedDescription: While traveling west on the i-210 bridge in lake charles, la at approx. 7:15 pm last night, i observed a very bright white light to the east over westlake, la about 2 miles away. the light was very large, bright, and appeared to be stationary while driving. i thought possibly it may be a commercial airliner flying at reduced altitude with its landing lights on. however, this would be very unusual over the city of westlake. i lost sight of the lights as i exited i-210 onto i-10 east. as i entered i-10 east, i expected to once again view the large light directly facing it. however, the light was unexpectedly no longer in view. however, at 7:30 pm after arriving home in westlake; i then observed very bright red and blue lights in the sky in about the same location as the earlier light, which was now to my south appearing to be over i-10 in westlake about 2 miles away. the red and blue lights appeared to be side by side each shinning outward in opposite directions like colored search lights. the lights looked too large to be on any known aircraft at that distance, and did not blink or strobe like aircraft lighting. the red/blue light appeared to be stationary in the sky. then, the lights did a deliberate move to the west; and without stopping or turning the light started moving back to the east with a 360 degees change in direction. and then, once again the object appeared to be sitting stationary in the sky. at this point, i ran inside to get my video camera. i videotaped about a minute as i watched the object in the viewfinder it appeared to just fade away? the video was not great, as the video was skaky and i should have turned on manual focus, instead of letting the auto focus distort the image. i will attempt to attach a still shot from the video. during the few minutes i observed the lights in the sky, no sound was heard from the object.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Large lights stationary, moving, and reverse direction without any noise.

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 30 hunters going to eagle lake to hunt dove, and ducks.  28 hunters were hunting ducks behind us two dove hunters.  fence line separated both hunting parties.  my friend and i were facing west, and the other 28 hunters were facing east.  we got in the field at approximately 5:30 a.M.  got in our chairs to hunt, and check our gear.  saw three strange tear drop shaped lights off in the distance at approximately 1-2 miles out.  one of the shapes headed straight for us in a line and then sat hovered no sound, at approximately 1-mile out.  had pinkish blueish hue to the object.  we started loading our shot guys with intent to start shooting if it got any closer.  it just sat there approximately 1-mile out, and 1-mile off the ground.  then took off rapidly to the upper sky heading west southwest, and disappeared suddenly.  we never spoke of it together as i was with a work colleague.  we were fixated on the closest object as it was coming at us, and lost track of the other two.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three tear drop shaped objects in sky before dove hunt

content.detailedDescription: The picture was taken by my daughters while driving. i am not sure what made them decided to take a picture of the sun or the glowing object but i do remember it being some strange bright light in the sky that caught our attention. the object was not viewable until after examining the photo later on. you can see the object below the glow.
content.summary: Random pic taken by daughters while driving.

content.detailedDescription: My son and i noticed an extended, white ford van pull up about 50' away from the big bear funplex.  we were waiting for a cab to take us back to the hotel.  my daughter was playing on the kid carousel.  a few minutes later, after i had forgotten about the van, an entourage of young, beautiful, nicely-dressed women walked in single file, with a couple adults escorting them.  they were all quite serious and quiet. as i was standing by the door, i got a look at most of them.  it was quite unusual to see so many beautiful ladies at once, so i had a quizzical look on my face, which one of them saw and looked back at me as if in acknowledgement.  it was a kind of "what are you looking at" kind of look.  i was very preoccupied with spotting the cab -- it was about 30 minutes late -- that i only occasionally looked over at the young women.  when i did, though, i noticed that their movements were almost synchronized.  they still hadn't said a word, and it had been at least five minutes.  the woman who looked at me was the only one walking around the perimeter of the other girls.  at one point she walked up to me to throw something in the garbage.  i instinctively moved back a couple inches to allow her to throw out her garbage (water bottle, not sure)without looking at her.  before we left, the older lady, who i think was a human, said, "ok girls, why don't we all come over here," which was only 4 feet from me.  they all moved over to her in perfect silence in one motion.  once they were all together, the human lady stopped talking, but they were all watching her silently.  at this point, the cab was driving up, so i yelled to my son right over the young ladies.."the cab's here!"  then he yelled to his sister, "come on!"  they walked right through the crowd of 7 or so entities to the door.  they remained quiet and focused on the human lady.  i didn't notice who had led the group in, but according to author charles hall, it was most likely an elder male entity brought along for security.  here's the thing: i was so preoccupied with waiting for the cab that it didn't occur to me what was going on until i got home that evening.  but my subconscious knew what was going on and was taking mental notes.  after i had put it all together, i was somewhat shocked.  it fit the profile perfectly, and i had witnessed it.
content.summary: Tall whites/nordics on human assimilation outing

content.detailedDescription: I was at a friend's house.  i and a group of friends stepped out onto the deck to get some air.  the sky was clear and i had looked up to see the stars.  i thought the object was a star.  it looked like a small point of light in the sky.  it stared to move in a circular pattern. it then sped up and started moving in zig zag patterns, then shot in a straight line, and zig zagged again.  after doing this a few times, it shot off in a straight line and disappeared.  after it disappeared, my friend turned to me and said "did you see it too?"  we were shocked and a bit frightened.
content.summary: Star-like light changing direction

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work on 12-21-15 at around 8:30pm, and while i was on highway 249 just before crossing over the magnolia city limits, my eyes were directed to the sky because of a very bright light that appreared to "wobble" or "shimmy" back and forth with a darker larger object next to it...  i've never quite seen anything like this before, so i grabbed my cell phone and took a few photos... it was dark and i was driving so the pictures do not do justice to what i actually saw. i tried to keep looking at it but as soon as i drove under it, i couldn't see it any longer.  it was over pretty quickly.
content.summary: Hwy 249 driving into magnolia texas and plainly saw ufo hovering in sky

content.detailedDescription:
my roommate and i were at home. i was in the living room, he was in his room, but when the rumbling and roaring started shaking the house, we both went to investigate outside. 
 despite the weather radar showing everything was clear, low clouds blanketed the sky, and a light rain was falling. we tried to pinpoint where the sound was coming from, and it appeared to be generated from something up above the clouds, something massive and slow, moving east. the sound perpetuated for about 15 minutes, until the object moved out of ear shot. i found both the temperature and pressure data from that night, as well as the radar image from that night, which shows no clouds in the area at that time. the pressure and temperature also show an identical spike at the same time the object passed through.
content.summary: Loud rumble, shook the house, affected the temp and pressure noticeably, like it was enormous.

content.detailedDescription: I have never told this story to an agency before, but here it is as i remember it. in 1955 our family moved to the county outside the city limits south of kansas city to a new home development that was being built. so there was new home construction. this is important as you will see. i was 5 years old when we moved. either that year or the following year, my grandparents came to visit us. it was a beautiful sunny summer day. the sky was blue with a few white puffy clouds. grandfather and i took a walk south on holly street from 97th to 99th street to a ravine a few yard south of 99th street. we looked down into the ravine and there was a shiny, silvery disc-shaped object that seemed to be floating a few feet above the ground making a humming sound. it seemed as if the object was made of three pieces, a top (like a dinner plate turned upside down), a ribbed center section that seemed to be spinning independently of the top and bottom plates, and a bottom (like a dinner plate turned right side up). but i really can't be sure if it was just the center section or the whole thing that was spinning. there seemed to be several small people there. i was not afraid, but i was very excited and happy to see them. i pointed at them and said something to grandfather, but he seemed to be in a daze and paid no attention to me. the next thing i remember we were standing in front of my house a few blocks up the street. my grandfather was still in a daze. i can remember trying to talk to him about it but he seemed to be unresponsive. i was very tired after that and went to sleep on my parents bed. i remember thinking about that before i went to sleep wondering what had happened. before i went to sleep, i remember thinking that i had seen some plumbing sticking up out of the ground from the construction. and that is what i told myself that it was. i did not remember all this until i was in my 40's running around the track. then the whole thing came flooding back. there were many other personal consequences i suffered as a result of this event. for example, when my parents took me to see the fairy princess, she was wearing a silvery dress with a wand. i was terrified and ran through the department store and hid inside a rack of clothes. i was terrified of needles and getting shots. at night, i surrounded myself with stuffed animals for protection and when i looked at the window in my bedroom i thought about being on a flying carpet and flying through the sky. i never understood nay of this until that day on the track when everything came flooding back. after that, i had constant, nightly dreams of ufo's, abductions, being in spacecraft. seeing aliens. these dreams went on for years. about 7 years after that day on the track those dreams, thankfully, went away. i also have a lump in the crook of my right arm which i never understood till that day. it's still there. but that is a whole other story. i could make a drawing of the craft. that is crystal clear in my mind. but i have no way of putting it on my computer.
content.summary: With grandfather on a walk. saw the object and entities. next thing i know we were  in front of my house.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
Went outside walking with my father as we usually do at night, these odd blue light caught my eye that was almost pulsating but was very noticeable. these objects looked like stars that is until they were moving in all types of directions not fast but it looked as if they were descending and then asending upwards as well as other directions such as left and right. there was a little bit of cloud cover as well which the blue light that came from these objects made the clouds pulsate blue. when i saw the blue light without the clouds it was very distinct as if you cloud see the light itself, imagine a helix outlined in blue light as if these objects were scanning the sky for some reason. we watched for awhile from the street, i personally started getting an uncomfortable feeling so i suggested lets go back inside. at first we laughed it off but then we both decided lets just go back home. never seen anything like it, i know for a fact it wasn't an airplane because during this exact time a plane did go over and we could see it and hear it and id it from its blinking lights. whatever we saw was moving like nothing i have ever seen in the sky, plus emitting this blue light from these objects as if they were scanning the sky or something, it was basically pulsating at times and the clouds made it blurring as if the clouds turned blue but when we saw the same light in an area with no clouds it produced a very distinct blue light as i stated earlier that almost look like a helix of some sort. 

whatever was producing these lights made no sounds and resembled stars yet they had three lights almost as if you could imagine three stars bunched together per object forming a triangular object that was emitting this blue type of light that would pulsate and then retract/repeat itself as it moved in an odd fashion.
too be honest i don't know what to think, as to what we saw but it was definitely not an airplane nor an actual star.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other,Unknown
content.summary: Triangular starlike crafts 7 give or take emitting this blue light as if they were scanning something

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting on the couch in the living room, responding to social media. all lights in house were off. it was completely dark except for my computer screen. suddenly there was a flash of blinding white light outside the patio window (which i was facing) that lit up **everything**. it only lasted a fraction of a second, like a flash from a florescent light bulb exploding on a much, much bigger scale. no noise, no other disturbances (in the trees outside the house, the park beside us, ect). temperature >25  degrees f. 

might have dismissed it as heat lightning but it's freezing out this evening, and there was no bolt, it was literally just an area-wide flash that lit up everything. i reminded me of the flash of a meteorite being filmed (like in europe a few years ago). 

very eerie, gave me goosebumps.
content.summary: Blinding flash of light above building

content.detailedDescription: While taking an evening walk my wife and i observed a very bright object - which i at first mistook for a star, except this one was rapidly moving and clearly not all that high. i estimate it's altitude at approx. 2000 meters because we saw it just clear the leissiggrat mountain which is at that altitude and then disappear behind it. from where we were observing the light to the leissiggrat mountain is approx. 14.5 km. the light traveled this distance in approx. 30-40 seconds, which if my math is correct, means it was traveling faster than 1500 kmh. we heard no sounds emanating from this bright thing even as it flew almost directly over us. we continued our walk and then observed this light returning over the lake of thun, and then  it very quickly flew in a north-westerly direction (roughly the direction of bern) and faded from view in only a few seconds so it must have been traveling much faster than we observed it the first time. there was a full moon this evening but partially hidden by clouds. the object was brighter than the brightest visible stars or planets visible that evening. the sky in our area was cloudless but there were was some broken cloud cover in the direction this thing flew,  which it disappeared behind for a few seconds before reemerging from the clouds only to disappear behind the mountains a few seconds later, as i explained above. i should add that this is not the first time my wife and i have observed strange lights in our area. i tried to capture the moving light with the camera on my iphone but the camera doesn't seem to be sensitive enough to record anything in the night sky.
content.summary: Very bright quickly moving starlike object observed by wife and myself

content.detailedDescription: At 12:15 a.M. on sunday december 13th 2015, i had just returned from san francisco to sacramento.  i dropped my friends off at 25th st. and 5th ave. i was driving east on 5th ave.  up ahead, a person was trying to park his car and not doing too well.  i sat at the stop sign at 27th and 5th ave. to wait until he was done before i drove by him.  while i was sitting there for about 15 seconds, i noticed three small lights directly to the east, about a quarter of a mile ahead, fairly high in the sky.  at this point they looked to be the size of golf balls and were a pale orange.  a storm was coming in and there were clouds in the sky but also big patches of clear sky.  i was confused because at first i thought they were lights on a radio tower as there is a law school campus there (mcgeorge school of law).  however, i drove about 4 more blocks east on 5th avenue and came the the stop sign at franklin blvd. and 5th ave. now i could see that the three lights were orange orbs and were moving west.  at this point they looked to be the size of tennis balls.  i sat at the stop sign and watched them as they made a slight turn towards the north so that they were now traveling northwest above highway 99, a freeway that cuts through sacramento.  they weren't visible long before they disappeared into a cloud.  i turned onto franklin blvd. going north and then made an immediate right back onto 5th ave. so i was again heading east on 5th ave.  i crossed the bridge over highway 99 and got to 34th st. and 5th ave., right in front of mcgeorge school of law.  at this point, 2 more orange balls came out of a cloud headed on the same path as the first three.  i opened my window and listened for any sounds.  just like with the first three, there were no sounds.  these two didn't stay visible long.  they also went into the clouds after turning towards the northwest, basically the same direction as the first three.  i began to drive east again on 5th avenue.  i only got one more block when a 6th orange ball came out of the clouds. this one was lower, brighter, and appeared to be the size of a softball.  at first, it seemed to be heading right for my car.  i had stopped and again put my window down.  it flew overhead just to the left of my driver's side of the car.  i could see this one better.  it didn't turn towards the north like the others and there were no clouds suddenly at this moment.  i was in a dangerous neighborhood and needed to keep going, so i drove slowly east, looking over my left shoulder every few seconds until i got to where 5th ave. meets broadway.  here, i stopped again and watched it for a few more seconds. it appeared that it had stopped moving and was hovering right over downtown sacramento, about 2 miles west of 5th and broadway.  i finally just drove home and didn't look back again.  when i got home it was about 12:25 a.M. sunday, 12/13/2015.  i called the sacramento non-emergency police number and told the dispatcher what i'd seen. i asked if there had been any other reports and he said "no."  i could tell he wasn't impressed.  regarding my feelings,reactions,and actions during and after the sightings: when i first saw the three lights, i felt confusion because i drive that route often and have never noticed "radio tower" lights.  i felt intrigued when i saw that the three lights were moving.  i did not feel scared.  i felt disappointed that i didn't have my camera or phone with me.  when i saw the second two, i felt amazed because i thought that there were only the first three.  when the sixth one came out of the clouds, it was different.  i felt some fear because it first appeared to be heading right for my car, only fairly high up.  i felt awe as i watched the sixth one go by.  when i got home and was getting out of my car, i did feel some fear and for a couple of nights after that, i was afraid to look up at the sky.  i also felt disappointment because i realized that i will most likely never seen them again and i knew that most people would not think that it was anything other than helicopters or something. one person mentioned drones.  i googled "photos of drones flying at night" and none of the pictures on google even come close to looking like what i saw. among the pictures on google of drones, i did see one photo with three orange orbs in it.  because these were supposed to be photos of drones, i clicked onto it thinking that i'd found the explanation to what i saw.  imagine my surprise when that picture turned out to be not one of drones flying at night, but it was a picture of orange ufos seen in oregon a few years ago.
content.summary: 6 orange orbs 3 then 2 then 1

content.detailedDescription: Ufo responds to my light when i flash it flashes back in respond, i feel it is the same ufo and emitted the same light a pulse brighter than the brightest star pure white light, this is the second time they respond to my light first respond was dec 20 2015 @ 6:30-6:50pm @ northridge ca 2x they came by.
content.summary: Ufo responds to my light when i flash it flashes back in respond, i feel it is the same ufo and emitted the same light a pulse brighter than the brightest star pure white light

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 9 p.M. on saturday, october 31, 2015, my daughter and i were driving south on hwy 43 towards columbia, tn when we saw 4 bright blue-white lights in the sky on the driver’s side of the car. they were approximately 50 feet in the air.  at first we thought they were lighting up a haunted attraction for halloween, but after looking a bit longer we noticed there were points of more concentrated lights at each corner, so the light source was coming from above, not the ground. they maintained a square shape, and looked like 4 lights, but occasionally a light would travel from one corner to another in a random fashion, so there may have been as many as 8 lights total. they were ahead of us at first on the left, but as we approached the main intersection of hwy 43 with hwy 31 the lights were keeping pace with us. my daughter snapped a couple of photos with her phone. we crossed the intersection and the lights were still pacing us, as they continued to do for several more miles. then i looked back over and they were not there. we were relieved, but a few minutes later they were slightly ahead of us, kept pace for at least 5 more miles, then disappeared.
content.summary: 4 lights in square pattern near columbia, tn - paced car for several miles then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I saw two of them last night, december 21st, about 7:15  flying together, over myrtle beach, sc, not far from the myrtle beach international airport.  they appeared to be about a quarter mile up, and about the size of a commercial jet.  they both were triangular in shape and had white , blinking lights on each point, a red light in the center.   they moved at a slow pace and made no noise such as a glider would.  i viewed them for a full two minutes as they flew south to north directly over where i was standing.  initially when i spotted them i thought they were military planes that we see so often flying in this area, but as they got closer i realized this was not the case.  as i watched and realized they were flying too slow to be a typical jet, then noticed there was no noise coming from them, i became more and more fascinated and curious!  and then, they were gone.  at that moment i thought why didn't i record what i was seeing??!  too late!  i can't be the only one who saw this, they were close,  big and slow!  perhaps someone else spotted them and took a video.﻿
content.summary: Triangular with white blinking lights at its points and red solid light in center bottom

content.detailedDescription: During the 2014 wild fires in north san diego. i was taking  pictures  of the  helicopters  flying over our  neighborhood. in two of these pics i discovered these  anomalies. i thought they were  interesting. i would like to see what you all think. the  picture  quality isn't great, i had to take it from my flat screen t v.
content.summary: Took a photo of a  helicopter  with a u f o in the the back ground.

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were throwing away the garbage, when gazing at the moon, we were also  talking about the clouds covering the moon.  next to the moon were two bright stars, as we were walking we noticed the two stars moving at the same exact speed, but the distance was so high, at the level of the stars, they were traveling at the same speed in an exact movement, they finally traveled south and out of sight as the clouds covered our sight of them.  they were definitely two rapidly traveling objects and too far up to be planes.  later that night, we heard of the russian missile on the news.  these two light were not missiles.
content.summary: 2 objects  thought to be two distant stars close to one another travel at rapid speed

content.detailedDescription: I was standing within a few feet of a barn with a horse. i noticed the object because of the illumination from the windows. i knew that it was, without a doubt extra-terrestial. i estimated that it was approximately 30 feet long and and  20 feet wide. it had three windows down each of the 30 foot sides. it came from the east then hovered for about 2 minutes. i did nothing but stood and watched. it left in an easterly direction. while in motion its process was unhurried. the view of the craft, as it disappeared was clearly rectangular.
content.summary: As craft was hovering it appeared to have 6 translucent windows. after it hovered it reversed its directions.  clear view of rectangular shape as it moved away.

content.detailedDescription:
I had taken my 2 sons to see a movie at the imax in downtown raleigh that saturday night. as we were leaving to come home, i saw 25-30 circular lights in the sky overhead. instantaneously, and only for a second, i thought there must be some type of fireworks show going on. however, the lights did not disappear. at this point, i did not believe there was anything other-worldly about them (i just thought it was unusual and i wanted to see what these things were). i pulled the car into the nearest stop (a hess gas station). my 2 children and i got out of the car and saw what now only seemed to be about 10 -15 fireballs in the sky directly over our head. i knew then that this was something spectacular as these fireballs seem to move deliberately in pairs of two or three and at a very slow pace. they emitted no sound, but they definitely moved in patterns that were not random and there was an ebb and flow to their movement. again, all these fireballs seemed to be grouped together in packs of 2 or 3 and seemed to be interacting with one another. as they went over our head, they seemed to suddenly disappear. by the time i got my i-phone out to take a video, only a couple remained in the sky. i am attaching that video so that you can get an idea of their movement, but unfortunately they appear smaller in the video than what we saw with our own eyes. the entire sighting took less than 5 minutes, and by the end of the 5 minutes, both my children were anxious. consequently, we got back in the car and headed home as i did not want to unnecessarily frighten my children.

i watched the news that night looking for a report on what i saw (i even suspected there might be some breaking news on it as this was over downtown raleigh, a very public place). however, there was no mention of it. i even e-mailed my video to the local weather guy (a friend of mine), but he did not comment on it. i just let it go until it came up today in a conversation with a friend.  it was suggested i report it, so that is what i am doing now.
content.summary: 25 slow moving, interactive fireballs seen in downtown raleigh on saturday night.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside enjoying the evening at the lake where i live and the stars were just starting to be visible in the night sky. as i looked up into the sky i noticed one star which didn't look the same as the rest of them.  it had a golden yellowish hue to it and was visible to the southeast across the lake.  it wasn't the whiter color of the natural stars.  i looked at this light and said to myself that is no star and as i thought and wondered what this thing was it began to move closer to my current location.  i remember thinking i am not afraid and just having a feeling of curiosity about it.  it moved in a straight line across the sky absolutely silently.  i heard no engine noise saw no red or green lights like you would see on an aircraft.  it was a solid golden orb which had three very distinct radiating points of light from the center of the orb which tapered to a point.  so the light was wide at the point where it left this orb and narrowed to a point like a sword at the end.  i watched this thing move silently and wondered what sort of mess the government is playing around with now.  sorry i have never seen an alien and personally believe that the government is behind ufo sightings.  so i have never seen anything like this and yes i used to work for an airline so i know what planes look like as well as blimps and helicopters.  i recently watched the geminids meteor shower as well and this was none of those things.  it moved far to slowly and silently so all i can say is it was a ufo.  i watched as the thing moved into a low hanging cloud and i didn't see it after that.  i reported it on my facebook the day after it happened but simply wrote it up as a golden light seen in the sky.  i have since deleted my facebook page so confirming the actual date will only be possible if facebook holds onto old files.  there was another incident which occurred a few nights later as i was out swimming in the lake.  i was floating out in the water and gazing up at the stars as i floated on my back and i very clearly and distinctly saw a silvery-white flash of some ellipse shaped object above and to the north of my location.  i figured at the moment that it was merely a meteor yet i knew that it wasn't because it didn't streak across the sky it was a stationary object which flashed once in the night sky.  after i wrote it off as a possible light anomaly of the retina it did it yet again.  this time it had moved more to the east but not more than 200 feet from the previous place in which i had seen it the first time.  so when i say it flashed i must say that only the object itself lit up not the air or space around it as you would get with a camera flash.  when it flashed it gave the clear flash of the entire surface area of whatever it was that was up in the sky.  in other words it the object itself lit up without lighting up the area around it.  i have never seen anything like this before or since.  it looked like what people describe as a flying saucer.  my joke is that for all i know it was george bush flying around on a pleasure cruise in some secret military technology.
content.summary: Golden orb with three distinct radiant light points

content.detailedDescription: I went home from the kneipe than i gazed inzo the distance and i saw a loght above my neighbours chimney. first i thought it was santa claus. but then i remembered it not even christmas today. than i saw it mpving downwards. it fell behind the house and it was away. i couldnt find anything. i was scared
content.summary: Glowing thing above my neighbours chimney.

content.detailedDescription: i was in the plane riding from los angeles to georgia  around 6 am on december 21, 2015. this was shortly after take off, and i noticed the right-hand window facing east  the sun had a smaller sun like object coming off of it and sometimes slightly moving. at first it looked like potentially a glare but it was not.  i managed to catch it on video. if you watch through the whole thing you will see that it is not a camera glare. i also saw this with my own eyes  before i took the camera out to record.  eventually it disappeared.
content.summary: Saw smaller sun coming off of sun while riding in airplane

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend sent me this photo from work. she said she saw these objects and then they disappeared.
content.summary: The phot was sent to me by my girlfriend
